

Scope = ScopeAtoms
ScopeAtoms = ScopeAtom ScopeAtoms | Λ
ScopeAtom = Codes | "{" Scope "}" | Λ

Codes = Code CodeEnder Codes | Λ
CodeEnder = ";" | "\n"

Code = Symbol ParamList
ParamList = Param ParamList | Λ

Param = Atom | "[" AtomList "]"
AtomList = Atom "," AtomList | Atom

Atom = B
B = S "^" B | S "|" B | S "&" B | S
S = E ">>" S | E "<<" S | E
E = T "+" E | T "-" E | T
T = F "*" T | F "/" T | F "%" T | F
F = "-" G | "+" G | "~" G | G
G = Symbol | IntegerLiteral | "(" B ")"
